spell.archers_expansion.choking_gas.name: Choking Gas
spell.archers_expansion.choking_gas.desc: Creates a poisonous gas cloud on projectile contact and deals {damage} damage.
spell.archers_expansion.disabling_shot.d: Jumps back after hitting a target, slows and damages the target for {damage} damage. The jump can be disabled if you sneak.
spell.archers_expansion.fast_shot.name: Fast Shot
spell.archers_expansion.fast_shot.descri: With your next shots, you gain Movement Speed and Range Haste.
spell.archers_expansion.trick_shot.name: Trick Shot
spell.archers_expansion.trick_shot.descr: Creates a bouncing arrow, that bounces of targets, deals {damage} damage.
effect.archers_expansion.fast_shot.descr: Increases Range Haste and Movement Speed with each shot.
effect.archers_expansion.choking_gas.des: Damages the target through poison and silences it. Damage is increased on bleeding entities.
effect.archers_expansion.leaping_shot.de: Caster jumps backwards, can be disabled while sneaking.
Slows the target and damages it overtime.
spell.archers_expansion.arctic_volley.de: Shots 8 arctic arrows that deal {damage} damage and frosts targets.
spell.archers_expansion.enchanted_crysta: Deals {damage} damage, stuns and freezes the target.
spell.archers_expansion.frozen_pact.name: Frozen Pact
spell.archers_expansion.frozen_pact.desc: Damages the target according to their Frozen ticks and reduces its attack for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.archers_expansion.frozen_shot.name: Frozen Shot
spell.archers_expansion.frozen_shot.desc: Your next shots stack the frosted effect on targets, slowing them and freezing
effect.archers_expansion.enchanted_cryst: Stuns the target and gives the target frozen ticks.
effect.archers_expansion.frozen_pact.des: Damages the targets according to their Frozen ticks and makes reduces their attack.
effect.archers_expansion.frozen_shot.des: Your next shots stack the frosted effect on targets.
spell.archers_expansion.dual_shot.name: Dual Shot
spell.archers_expansion.pin_down.name: Pin Down
spell.archers_expansion.pin_down.descrip: Deals {damage} damage, the target cant move or jump for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.archers_expansion.point_blank_shot: Deals {damage} damage, also gets knocked back more, the closer it is to the caster.
spell.archers_expansion.smoldering_arrow: Your next shot creates a small explosion near the target, damaging and burning entities around.
effect.archers_expansion.smoldering_arro: Creates a small explosion near the target, damaging and burning entities around. the target.
Your next shot creates a small explosion near the target, damaging and burning entities around.
effect.archers_expansion.point_blank_sho: Knocks the target back, , the closer it is to the caster, the further it gets knock backed.
effect.archers_expansion.pin_down.descri: The target cant move or jump during the effect.
